remarks: Any group element is annihilated by any multiple of the group exponent. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.)
statement:
gexcl.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
gexcl.2 $e |- E = ( gEx ` G ) $.
gexid.3 $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
gexid.4 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gexdvdsi $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ E || N ) -> ( N .x. A ) = .0. ) $.
